subject: My Dear Good Friend...
body:
My Dear Good Friend...
Happy Weekend And Remain Bless With Your Family.
This message will come to you as a SURPRISE because you don't know and
also I have not been in contact with you, but want I want to explain
and tell you is the truth about your Inheritance and Compensation
Payment included lottery winner while you have not receive, due to
wrong advice for those that claimed that they are helping you.
Do you know that, a suit case was brought against your File of payment
at the Federal High Court in Nigeria seeking to claim your fund by
many Government Top Office, because the see it as an opportunity to in
rich them, but you will not know and those that are contacting you,
does not know what is going on about your fund and that is the most
reason why, you have not receive and you can not receive it because,
those  that contacting you are not on the right track to deliver your
fund to you.. If You Listen to my advice right now, stop lavishing
your money to them and ONLY FOLLOW THOSE  KNOWS ROAD TO DELIVER YOUR
FUND TO YOU.
Have it in your mind that you don't have any REPRESENTATIVE AND A
LAWYER to stay by YOU and fight for your right. You know the important
of A REPRESENTATIVE AND A LAWYER in every nation and I will explain to
you the important of A REPRESENTATIVE AND A LAWYER.
1: IMPORTANT OF A LAWYER. A Lawyer is a person that spoke on your
behalf and also to defend you in any case that brought against you and
also a lawyer will proof that the case brought against you is not true
and He will fight for your interest till the end of the matter.
2: A REPRESENTATIVE is  a person that stand and represent you in any
Occasion or any official duty and He  or She will stand for the
interest of you person. He or She will not allow things to go wrong.
In this matter, you don't have  any REPRESENTATIVE AND A LAWYER  and
that is why you can not and will not receive your fund, but if you
will listen to me to make me your  REPRESENTATIVE AND YOUR A LAWYER
and also agreed to follow the instruction from me, you will confirm
your fund.
Note If You are interested, Kindly Respond Back to this email address
for more advice  ( 
barristercollinsuche1@gmail.com
 )
Thanks For Listening To Me.

subject: Re:   My Dear Good Friend...
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're having a good weekend as well. I must admit, your message has caught me by surprise since we haven't been in contact before. However, I'm interested to hear what you have to say about my payment and the lottery winnings.

You mentioned that there have been some issues with my payment due to wrong advice from people claiming to help me. Can you please provide more details about this? Who are these people and what kind of advice did they give?

You also mentioned a lawsuit against my file at the Federal High Court in Nigeria. That sounds concerning. Could you explain why this lawsuit was filed and who is behind it? It's important for me to understand the situation fully.

Regarding the importance of having a lawyer, I agree that legal representation can be crucial in certain situations. Can you elaborate on how having a lawyer would benefit me in this case? What specific role would they play?

I appreciate your concern and willingness to offer advice. However, before proceeding further, I would like to know more about your background and how you came across this information. It's important for me to verify the credibility of the information being shared.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Randy
